Sentencas: Doped ceria materials are widely studied for their application in solid oxide fuel cell devices.
Titulo: In situ pair distribution function study on lanthanum doped ceria

Sentencas: In this work we report on the average and local structure evolution of La-doped ceria (Ce1-xLaxO2-x/2, x = 0.25) under fuel cells' operating conditions.
Titulo: In situ pair distribution function study on lanthanum doped ceria

Sentencas: The effect of doping on the average structure is investigated using conventional Rietveld analysis of neutron powder diffraction data.
Titulo: In situ pair distribution function study on lanthanum doped ceria

Sentencas: The extent of disorder as well as the local structure evolution at high temperature are investigated by employing very hard X-rays under both air and reducing atmosphere.
Titulo: In situ pair distribution function study on lanthanum doped ceria
